benchmark_details.name: User Profile Datasets
benchmark_details.overview: This paper presents two high-quality open-source user profile datasets for profile construction and updating, which serve to evaluate user profile modeling techniques in dynamic settings.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide robust resources for evaluating user profiling techniques in dynamic scenarios and to advance personalization systems.

data.source: Wiki People dataset and generated user profiles via LLMs.
data.annotation: Profiles generated using a probabilistic framework and validated through human evaluation.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated using precision, recall, and F1 Score at the user level.
methodology.interpretation: Higher precision, recall, and F1 scores indicate better model performance in predicting user profiles.
methodology.validation: Manual evaluation of 10% of generated profiles using Fleissâ€™s kappa for agreement among annotators.
